DOC.brief_summary: To asses the precision of a score to predict chronic post surgical pain in patients undergoing inguinal hernia repair, abdominal hysterectomy, vaginal hysterectomy and thoracotomy. Prospective multicenter cohort study in 21 hospital in spain.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of Predictive Scale of Chronic Postsurgical Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients with given inform consent, aged mor than 18 years, who undergo scheduled surgery of one of the following types: inguinal hernia (men), abdominal hysterectomy, vaginal hysterectomy and thoracotomy (men) Patients aged less than 18 years, Patients requiring reoperation because of surgical complications.
